   2

   4  gi.require_version('Gtk', '3.0')

  24   
  25  CLIENTVERSION="v0.5.6-gtk3" 
  26  CLIENT_STRING="oVPN.to Client %s" % (CLIENTVERSION) 
  27   
  28  ABOUT_TEXT = """Credits and Cookies go to... 
  29  + ... all our customers! We can not exist without you! 
  30  + ... d0wn for hosting DNS on dns.d0wn.biz! 
  31  + ... bauerj for code submits! 
  32  + ... semool for gtk3 fork! 
  33  + ... dogpellet for DNStest() ideas! 
  34  + ... ungefiltert-surfen.de for WorldWide DNS! 
  35  + ... famfamfam.com for flag and silk icons! 
  36   
  37  Need Help? 
  38

  40  """ 
  41   
  42  DOMAIN = "vcp.ovpn.to" 
  43  PORT="443" 
  44  API="xxxapi.php" 
  45   

  46 -class Systray: 

  47 -        def __init__(self): 

  48                  self.self_vars() 
  49                  self.tray = Gtk.StatusIcon() 
  50                  self.tray.set_from_stock(Gtk.STOCK_EXECUTE) 
  51                  self.window = Gtk.Window(Gtk.WindowType.TOPLEVEL) 
  52                  self.window.connect("delete-event", Gtk.main_quit) 
  53                  self.init_localization(None) 
  54                  if self.preboot(): 
  55                          self.init_theme() 
  56                          self.tray.connect('popup-menu', self.on_right_click) 
  57                          self.tray.connect('activate', self.on_left_click) 
  58                          self.tray.set_tooltip_markup(CLIENT_STRING) 
  59                          if self.UPDATEOVPNONSTART == True: 
  60                                  if self.check_inet_connection() == True: 
  61                                          self.check_remote_update() 
  62                                  else: 
  63                                          self.msgwarn(_("Could not connect to %s") % (DOMAIN),_("Update failed!")) 
  64                          thread = threading.Thread(target=self.systray_timer) 
  65                          thread.daemon = True 
  66                          thread.start() 
  67                          self.win_firewall_analyze() 
  68                  else: 
  69                          sys.exit()

 247 -        def preboot(self): 

 248                  self.debug(text="def preboot()") 
 249                  self.self_vars() 
 250                  if self.OS == "win32": 
 251                                  if self.win_pre1_check_app_dir(): 
 252                                          if self.win_pre2_check_profiles_win(): 
 253                                                  if self.win_pre3_load_profile_dir_vars(): 
 254                                                          if self.check_config_folders(): 
 255                                                                  if self.read_interfaces(): 
 256                                                                          if self.write_options_file(): 
 257                                                                                  return True 
 258                  elif OS == "linux2" : 
 259                          self.errorquit(text=_("Operating System not supported: %s") % (self.OS)) 
 260                  elif OS == "darwin": 
 261                          self.errorquit(text=_("Operating System not supported: %s") % (self.OS)) 
 262                  else:  
 263                          self.errorquit(text=_("Operating System not supported: %s") % (self.OS))

 265 -        def win_pre1_check_app_dir(self): 

 266                  self.debug(text="def win_pre1_check_app_dir()") 
 267                  os_appdata = os.getenv('APPDATA') 
 268                  if os.path.exists("appdata"): 
 269                          print "alternative folder found" 
 270                          self.bin_dir = os.getcwd() 
 271                          self.app_dir = "%s\\appdata\\ovpn" % (self.bin_dir) 
 272                          oldpath = "%s\\ovpn" % (os_appdata) 
 273                          newpath = self.app_dir 
 274                          try: 
 275                                  if os.path.exists(oldpath) and not os.path.exists(newpath): 
 276                                          self.copy_appdata(oldpath,newpath) 
 277                          except: 
 278                                  self.msgwarn(_("Copy old appdata to new folder failed!"),_("Error: def win_pre1_check_app_dir()")) 
 279                  else: 
 280                          self.app_dir = "%s\\ovpn" % (os_appdata) 
 281                          self.bin_dir = "%s\\bin\\client\\dist" % (self.app_dir) 
 282                  if not os.path.exists(self.app_dir): 
 283                          if self.DEBUG: print("win_pre1_check_app_dir %s not found, creating." % (self.app_dir)) 
 284                          os.mkdir(self.app_dir) 
 285                  if os.path.exists(self.app_dir): 
 286                          self.debug(text="win_pre1_check_app_dir self.app_dir=%s :True" % (self.app_dir)) 
 287                          return True 
 288                  else: 
 289                          self.errorquit(text = _("Could not create app_dir: %s") % (self.app_dir))

 291 -        def list_profiles(self): 

 292                  self.debug(text="def list_profiles()") 
 293                  self.profiles_unclean = os.listdir(self.app_dir) 
 294                  self.PROFILES = list() 
 295                  for profile in self.profiles_unclean: 
 296                          if profile.isdigit(): 
 297                                  self.PROFILES.append(profile) 
 298                  self.PROFILES_COUNT = len(self.PROFILES) 
 299                  self.debug(text="def list_profiles: profiles_count %s" % (self.PROFILES_COUNT))

 301 -        def win_pre2_check_profiles_win(self): 

 302                  self.debug(text="def win_pre2_check_profiles_win()") 
 303                  self.list_profiles() 
 304                  if self.PROFILES_COUNT == 0: 
 305                          self.debug(text="No profiles found") 
 306                          if self.USERID == False: 
 307                                  self.debug(text="spawn popup userid = %s" % (self.USERID)) 
 308                                  self.form_ask_userid() 
 309                                  if not self.USERID == False and not self.APIKEY == False: 
 310                                          return True 
 311                  elif self.PROFILES_COUNT == 1 and self.PROFILES[0] > 1: 
 312                          self.USERID = self.PROFILES[0] 
 313                          return True 
 314                  elif self.PROFILES_COUNT > 1: 
 315                          if not self.select_userid() == True: 
 316                                  self.errorquit(text=_("Select User-ID failed!")) 
 317                          return True

 367                  self.systray_icon_testing = "%s\\205.ico" % (self.ico_dir) 
 368                  self.systray_icon_syncupdate1 = "%s\\289_1.ico" % (self.ico_dir) 
 369                  self.systray_icon_syncupdate2 = "%s\\289_2.ico" % (self.ico_dir) 
 370                  self.systray_icon_syncupdate3 = "%s\\266.ico" % (self.ico_dir) 
 371   
 372                  self.CA_FILE = "%s\\cacert_ovpn.pem" % (self.bin_dir) 
 373                  if not self.load_ca_cert(): 
 374                          return False 
 375                   
 376                  self.WINDIR = os.getenv('WINDIR') 
 377                  if os.path.isdir(self.WINDIR): 
 378                          self.WIN_NETSH_EXE = "%s\\system32\\netsh.exe" % (self.WINDIR) 
 379                          self.WIN_ROUTE_EXE = "%s\\system32\\route.exe" % (self.WINDIR) 
 380                          self.WIN_IPCONFIG_EXE = "%s\\system32\\ipconfig.exe" % (self.WINDIR) 
 381                          self.WIN_TASKKILL_EXE = "%s\\system32\\taskkill.exe" % (self.WINDIR) 
 382                  else: 
 383                          self.errorquit(text=_("Error: '%s' not found!") % (self.WINDIR)) 
 384                   
 385                  if not os.path.isfile(self.WIN_NETSH_EXE): 
 386                          self.errorquit(text=_("Error: '%s' not found!") % (self.WIN_NETSH_EXE)) 
 387                   
 388                  if not os.path.isfile(self.WIN_ROUTE_EXE): 
 389                          self.errorquit(text=_("Error: '%s' not found!") % (self.WIN_ROUTE_EXE)) 
 390                   
 391                  if not os.path.isfile(self.WIN_IPCONFIG_EXE): 
 392                          self.errorquit(text=_("Error: '%s' not found!") % (self.WIN_IPCONFIG_EXE)) 
 393                   
 394                  if not os.path.isfile(self.WIN_TASKKILL_EXE): 
 395                          self.errorquit(text=_("Error: '%s' not found!") % (self.WIN_TASKKILL_EXE)) 
 396                   
 397                  self.debug(text="win_pre3_load_profile_dir_vars loaded") 
 398                  return True

 452                                                          return True

 802 -        def win_read_interfaces(self): 

 803                  self.debug(text="def win_read_interfaces()") 
 804                  self.win_detect_openvpn() 
 805                  self.INTERFACES = list() 
 806                  string = "netsh.exe interface show interface" 
 807                  ADAPTERS = subprocess.check_output("%s" % (string),shell=True) 
 808                  ADAPTERS = ADAPTERS.split('\r\n') 
 809                  LANG = "undef" 
 810   
 811                  # language read hint 
 812                  if ADAPTERS[1].endswith("nsefladenavn"): 
 813                          LANG = "DK" 
 814                  elif ADAPTERS[1].endswith("Schnittstellenname"): 
 815                          LANG = "DE" 
 816                  elif ADAPTERS[1].endswith("Interface Name"): 
 817                          LANG = "EN" 
 818                  else: 
 819                          self.errorquit(text=_("Error reading your Interfaces from netsh.exe. Contact support@ovpn.to with Error-ID:\nADAPTERS[1]=(%s)\n") % (ADAPTERS[1])) 
 820   
 821                  text = "def win_read_interfaces: LANG = %s" % (LANG) 
 822                  self.debug(text=text) 
 823                  for line in ADAPTERS: 
 824                          self.debug(text="%s"%(line)) 
 825                          interface = line.split()

 827                                  if LANG == "DK": 
 828                                          if interface[1].startswith("Forbindelsen"): 
 829                                                  interface = interface[5:] 
 830                                          elif interface[1].startswith("Afbrudt"): 
 831                                                  interface = interface[3:] 
 832                                  elif LANG == "DE" or LANG == "EN": 
 833                                          interface = interface[3:] 
 834                                  else:

 854                          self.errorquit(text=_("Could not read your Network Interfaces! Please install OpenVPN or check if your TAP-Adapter is really enabled and driver installed."))

 858                  self.debug(text="TAP ADAPTERS bp = %s"%(TAPADAPTERS)) 
 859                  TAPADAPTERS.pop(0)

 867                                          self.debug(text="Found TAP ADAPTER: '%s'" % (INTERFACE)) 
 868                                          self.INTERFACES.remove(INTERFACE) 
 869                                          self.WIN_TAP_DEVS.append(INTERFACE) 
 870                                          break

 873                                  #       #self.debug(text="ignoring tap line") 
 874                                  #       pass

 876                                  #       #self.debug(text="ignoring line < 16")

 879                                  #       #self.debug(text="ignoring else")

 882                  if self.WIN_TAP_DEVICE in self.WIN_TAP_DEVS: 
 883                          self.debug(text="Found self.WIN_TAP_DEVICE '%s' in self.WIN_TAP_DEVS '%s'" % (self.WIN_TAP_DEVICE,self.WIN_TAP_DEVS)) 
 884                  if len(self.WIN_TAP_DEVS) == 0: 
 885                          self.errorquit(text=_("No OpenVPN TAP-Windows Adapter found!")) 
 886                  elif len(self.WIN_TAP_DEVS) == 1 or self.WIN_TAP_DEVS[0] == self.WIN_TAP_DEVICE: 
 887                          self.WIN_TAP_DEVICE = self.WIN_TAP_DEVS[0] 
 888                          self.debug(text="Selected self.WIN_TAP_DEVICE = %s" % (self.WIN_TAP_DEVICE)) 
 889                  else: 
 890                          self.debug(text="self.WIN_TAP_DEVS (query) = '%s'" % (self.WIN_TAP_DEVS)) 
 891                          dialogWindow = Gtk.MessageDialog(type=Gtk.MessageType.QUESTION,buttons=Gtk.ButtonsType.OK) 
 892                          dialogWindow.set_position(Gtk.WindowPosition.CENTER) 
 893                          dialogWindow.set_transient_for(self.window) 
 894                          try: 
 895                                  dialogWindow.set_icon_from_file(self.app_icon) 
 896                          except: 
 897                                  self.debug(text="def win_read_interfaces: #1 dialogWindow.set_icon_from_file(self.app_icon) failed") 
 898                                  pass

1703                                          if self.API_REQUEST(API_ACTION = "getconfigs"):

1712                                                                          self.timer_check_certdl_running = False 
1713                                                                          self.msgwarn(_("Update took too long...aborted!\nPlease retry in few minutes..."),_("Error: Update Timeout"))

1718                                                                          self.API_REQUEST(API_ACTION = "requestcerts") 
1719                                                                          self.OVERWRITE_TRAYICON = False 
1720                                                                          LAST_requestcerts = 0 
1721                                                                  else: 
1722                                                                          LAST_requestcerts += 1 
1723                                                                  self.STATUS_ICON_BLINK += 1 
1724                                                                  self.API_COUNTER -= 1 
1725                                                          # final step to download certs 
1726                                                          self.STATE_CERTDL = "getcerts" 
1727                                                          if self.API_REQUEST(API_ACTION = "getcerts"): 
1728                                                                  self.STATE_CERTDL = "extract" 
1729                                                                  if self.extract_ovpn(): 
1730                                                                          self.timer_check_certdl_running = False 
1731                                                                          self.msgwarn(_("Certificates and Configs updated!"),_("oVPN Update OK!")) 
1732                                                                          return True 
1733                                                                  else: 
1734                                                                          self.msgwarn(_("Extraction failed!"),_("Error: def inThread_timer_check_certdl")) 
1735                                                          else: 
1736                                                                  self.msgwarn(_("Failed to download certificates"),_("Error: def inThread_timer_check_certdl")) 
1737                                                          # finish downloading certs 
1738                                                  else: 
1739                                                          self.msgwarn(_("Failed to request certificates!"),_("Error: def inThread_timer_check_certdl")) 
1740                                          else: 
1741                                                  self.msgwarn(_("Failed to download configurations!"),_("Error: def inThread_timer_check_certdl")) 
1742                                  else: 
1743                                          self.timer_check_certdl_running = False 
1744                                          self.msgwarn(_("No update needed!"),_("oVPN Update OK!")) 
1745                                          return True 
1746                          #else: 
1747                          #       self.msgwarn(_("oVPN Update failed"),_("Error: def inThread_timer_check_certdl")) 
1748                  except: 
1749                          self.msgwarn(_("Failed to check for updates!"),_("Error: def inThread_timer_check_certdl")) 
1750                  self.timer_check_certdl_running = False 
1751                  return False

2007 -        def cell_sort(self, treemodel, iter1, iter2, user_data): 

2008                  try: 
2009                          self.debug(text="def cell_sort()") 
2010                          sort_column, _ = treemodel.get_sort_column_id() 
2011                          iter1 = treemodel.get_value(iter1, sort_column) 
2012                          iter2 = treemodel.get_value(iter2, sort_column) 
2013                          if float(iter1) < float(iter2): 
2014                                  return -1 
2015                          elif float(iter1) == float(iter2): 
2016                                  return 0 
2017                          else: 
2018                                  return 1 
2019                  except: 
2020                          pass

2022 -        def cell_sort_traffic(self, treemodel, iter1, iter2, user_data): 

2023                  try: 
2024                          self.debug(text="def cell_sort_traffic()") 
2025                          sort_column, _ = treemodel.get_sort_column_id() 
2026                          data1 = treemodel.get_value(iter1, sort_column) 
2027                          data2 = treemodel.get_value(iter2, sort_column) 
2028                          if data1 == "-1": 
2029                                  data1 = "0 GB" 
2030                          if data2 == "-1": 
2031                                  data2 = "0 GB" 
2032                           
2033                          iter1 = data1.split(" ") 
2034                          number1 = float(iter1[0]) 
2035                          byte1 = iter1[1] 
2036                          if byte1 == "TiB": 
2037                                  number1 = number1 * 1024 
2038                           
2039                          iter2 = data2.split(" ") 
2040                          number2 = float(iter2[0]) 
2041                          byte2 = iter2[1] 
2042                          if byte2 == "TiB": 
2043                                  number2 = number2 * 1024 
2044                           
2045                          if float(number1) < float(number2): 
2046                                  return -1 
2047                          elif float(number1) == float(number2): 
2048                                  return 0 
2049                          else: 
2050                                  return 1 
2051                  except:

3419                                  try: 
3420                                          t1 = time.time() 
3421                                          s = socket.socket(family, socktype) 
3422                                          s.connect(sockaddr) 
3423                                          t2 = time.time() 
3424                                          s.close() 
3425                                          PING = (t2-t1)*1000 
3426                                          if PING > 3000: 
3427                                                  PING = -2 
3428                                          #self.debug(text="def get_ovpn_ping: %s ms" % (PING)) 
3429                                          return PING

3687                                  buf = afile.read() 
3688                                  hasher.update(buf) 
3689                          fp.close()

5253 -        def ask_loadorunload_fw(self):

5268                                          self.win_netsh_restore_dns_from_backup() 
5269                                          self.debug(text="Firewall: rules restored!")
